titleStmt.title: The amorous abbess, or, Love in a nunnery a novel / translated from the French by a woman of quality.
titleStmt.author: Brémond, Gabriel de.
Woman of quality.

notesStmt.note: Translation of part of: Le Cercle, ou conversations galantes / G. Brémond. Cf. BM.
Attributed to G. Bremond. Cf. BM; Wing.
First English ed. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
